head.title: CheerpJ 4 Saxon HE Java 12.6 XML Workbench: XSLT 3.0, XQuery 3.1, XPath 3.1

ul.li: XSLT 3.0 against XML or JSON input or no input starting with xsl:template name="xsl:initial-template", allowing the use of xsl:result-document and xsl:message, presented in the result editor pane
XQuery 3.1 against XML or JSON input or no input, fn:trace can now be examined by selecting '*** trace ***' from the "result documents" select box
XPath 3.1 against XML or JSON input or no input, now with prefixes/namespaces xs, map, array, math and err predeclared
optional automatic evaluation of XSLT/XQuery/XPath as CheerpJ 4 also allows to run Java code (e.g. Saxon) from a web worker
